mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Round Dance Leaders School", "A Caller School in Your Future?", "Callers School Directory, 1985", "In A Callers School", "The Sedentary Can Square Dance", "How to Fly A Square Dance", "Vox Saltatoris: The Square Dancer Speaks Up", "The Bookshelf", "34th National Convention", and "Date Book." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "The Changing Scene", "Advanced Dancing", "Mostly Modular", "Contra Corner", "Experimental Notes", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", and "Current Releases."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
